headline: Needham Lowers Super Micro (SMCI) Price Target to $40, Keeps Buy
summary: We recently published an article titled 12 Best Data Storage Stocks to Buy Right Now. On February 4, Needham lowered its price target on Super Micro Computer, Inc. (NASDAQ:SMCI) to $40 from $51 while maintaining a Buy rating. The firm attributed the company’s second-quarter earnings outperformance to a large-scale data center deployment by a major […]

headline: Assessing Super Micro Computer’s Valuation After Mixed Returns And Strong Growth Expectations
summary: Setting the scene for Super Micro Computer Super Micro Computer (SMCI) has drawn investor attention after recent trading, with the stock last closing at $32.42. That puts current performance in context with its mixed short term and longer term return profile. See our latest analysis for Super Micro Computer. Recent trading has been a mix of short bursts of strength and pauses, with a 6.2% 7 day share price return and a 4.7% year to date share price return sitting against a 1 year total...
